title: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
content: Hello guys! Assuming a Bitcointalk user finds his or her local board in the forum but cannot speak their local dialect, would it be a crime to translate from English to their local language using a translator in order to comment on their local board? thank you.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Translator is not allowed in such way.Quote from: mprep on July 21, 2014, 05:27:51 PM27. Using automated translation tools to post translated content in Local boards is not allowed.
